question_text: Which best describes the role of a virtual machine manager (hypervisor) during virtualization?
answer_options: It converts guest OSes into host OSes
It shares CPU and memory resources among physical machines
It mediates the interaction between virtual machines and physical hardware
It installs guest operating systems onto the host
correct_answer: It mediates the interaction between virtual machines and physical hardware
